author: Noxix
install_msg: Website subscription management cog loaded! Use `[p]websitesubs` to get started.
name: WebsiteSubs
short: Manage website subscription roles with tier-based access and automatic expiration.
description: A comprehensive cog for managing website subscription roles including early access, tier-based roles, automatic 30-day expiration, and subscription tracking with manual management capabilities.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user subscription data including subscription dates, tiers, and expiration information.
